lead_paragraph: Bayern Munich destroyed Atletico Madrid’s dreams of winning the European Cup in 1974 and are out to wreck their hopes of reaching a second Champions League final in three years when they visit the Spanish capital for the semi-final first leg.

headline.print_headline: Atletico Get Chance for Revenge Against Bayern 42 Years On
headline.main: Atletico Get Chance for Revenge Against Bayern 42 Years On
